sentences.english: LanShi DE family together to Yangs marriage.

sentences.english: Occasionally some upper class gentlemen would come to her to propose marriage.
sentences.chinese: 常常上層社會所謂的紳士們會來提親。

sentences.english: KAKULE: "I went to my girlfriend's family to propose marriage, but I had nothing to give for a dowry."
sentences.chinese: 我去女朋友家家裏提親，但我沒什麼可以作爲彩禮。

sentences.english: Let Zhang Jian carried the sedan to Xu house second days.
sentences.chinese: 第二天就讓張吉安擡着花轎去徐家提親。

to get oneself a wife/to take a daughter-in-law
